builds.name: Mech build
builds.description: A powerful build focusing on Mechs with Taunt and Divine Shield abilities.

builds.name: Murloc build
builds.description: A scam build focusing on Murlocs with Deathrattle and Venomous abilities.

builds.name: Beast build
builds.description: A token spammer build focusing on Beasts with Deathrattles and Reborn abilities.

heroes.name: Ragnaros the Firelord
heroes.description: Passive At the end of your turn, give your left- and right- most minions +3/+3.

heroes.name: A. F. Kay
heroes.description: Passive Skip your first two turns, then Discover two minions from Tier 3.

heroes.name: Cookie the Cook
heroes.description: Hero Power: Throw a minion in your pot. When you've gathered 3, Discover from their types.

heroes.name: Infinite Toki
heroes.description: Hero Power: Refresh Bob's Tavern. Add a minion from a higher Tavern Tier.

heroes.name: King Mukla
heroes.description: Hero Power: Get two Bananas. Give everyone else one.

heroes.name: Patches the Pirate
heroes.description: Hero Power: Get a Pirate. After you buy a Pirate, your next Hero Power costs (1) less.

heroes.name: C'Thun
heroes.description: Hero Power: At end of turn, give a friendly minion +1/+1. Repeat 1 more time (upgrades each turn!).

heroes.name: Ambassador Faelin
heroes.description: Passive. Skip your first turn. Discover a Tier 2, 4, and 6 minion to get at those Tiers.

normal.description: Taunt, Divine Shield

golden.description: Taunt, Divine Shield

minions.name: Backstage Security
keywords: Battlecry - Does something when you play it from your hand.

normal.description: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to your hero.

golden.description: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to your hero twice.

normal.description: After you trigger a Battlecry, gain +1/+1.

golden.description: After you trigger a Battlecry, gain +2/+2.

normal.description: Battlecry: Give your other Murlocs +4 Health.

golden.description: Battlecry: Give your other Murlocs +8 Health.

normal.description: Divine Shield. Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Microbot.

golden.description: Divine Shield. Deathrattle: Summon two 2/2 Microbots.

normal.description: Divine Shield, Windfury

golden.description: Divine Shield, Windfury

normal.description: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of upgrading the Tavern by (2).

golden.description: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of upgrading the Tavern by (4).

normal.description: Spellcraft: Give a minion +4 Health and Taunt until next turn.

golden.description: Spellcraft: Give a minion +8 Health and Taunt until next turn.

normal.description: Whenever this gains Attack, gain +2 Health permanently.

golden.description: Whenever this gains Attack, gain +4 Health permanently.

normal.description: Has +2/+2 for each friendly Eternal Knight that died this game (wherever this is).

golden.description: Has +4/+4 for each friendly Eternal Knight that died this game (wherever this is).

normal.description: Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions twice.

golden.description: Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions twice.

normal.description: This minion sells for 3 Gold.

golden.description: This minion sells for 6 Gold.

normal.description: Whenever this attacks, gain +4/+2.

golden.description: Whenever this attacks, gain +8/+4.

normal.description: Deathrattle: Summon two 2/2 Skeletons.

golden.description: Deathrattle: Summon two 4/4 Skeletons.

normal.description: Your other Beasts have +4 Attack.

golden.description: Your other Beasts have +8 Attack.

normal.description: Deathrattle: Give this minion's maximum Health to another friendly minion.

golden.description: Deathrattle: Give this minion's maximum Health to another friendly minion, twice.

normal.description: Start of Combat: Deal 1 damage to adjacent minions and give them +4 Attack.

golden.description: Start of Combat: Deal 1 damage to adjacent minions and give them +8 Attack.

normal.description: The first two Spellcraft enchantments on this each turn are permanent.

golden.description: The first two Spellcraft enchantments on this each turn are permanent.

normal.description: Magnetic. At the end of your turn, gain +2/+2.

golden.description: Magnetic. At the end of your turn, gain +4/+4.

normal.description: Deathrattle: Summon two 0/2 Cublings with Taunt.

golden.description: Deathrattle: Summon two 0/2 Cublings with Taunt.

normal.description: Magnetic. At the start of your turn, gain 1 extra Gold.

golden.description: Magnetic. At the start of your turn, gain 2 extra Gold.

normal.description: Whenever a friendly Pirate attacks, give all friendly minions +3/+1.

golden.description: Whenever a friendly Pirate attacks, give all friendly minions +6/+2.

normal.description: Start of Combat: Give another friendly Dragon +7/+7 and Divine Shield.

golden.description: Start of Combat: Give two other friendly Dragons +7/+7 and Divine Shield.

normal.description: Magnetic. Divine Shield. Taunt.

golden.description: Magnetic. Divine Shield. Taunt.

normal.description: Deathrattle: Your Undead have +1 Attack this game (wherever they are).

golden.description: Deathrattle: Your Undead have +2 Attack this game (wherever they are).

normal.description: At the end of your turn, destroy the Undead to the left of this and resummon an exact copy.

golden.description: At the end of your turn, destroy the Undead to the left of this and resummon an exact copy.

normal.description: Battlecry: Give a minion Taunt. Then give your Taunt minions +2/+3.

golden.description: Battlecry: Give a minion Taunt. Then give your Taunt minions +4/+6.

normal.description: Avenge (4): Get a random Mecha-Demon.

golden.description: Avenge (4): Get 2 random Mecha-Demons.

normal.description: At the end of your turn, play a Blood Gem on adjacent minions.

golden.description: At the end of your turn, play 2 Blood Gems on adjacent minions.

normal.description: Deathrattle: Summon the highest Health Murloc from your hand for this combat only.

golden.description: Deathrattle: Summon the 2 highest Health Murlocs from your hand for this combat only.

normal.description: 1 Tavern spell each turn costs Health instead of Gold to buy. (1 left!)

golden.description: 2 Tavern spells each turn cost Health instead of Gold to buy. (2 left!)

normal.description: Also damages the minions next to whomever this attacks.

golden.description: Also damages the minions next to whomever this attacks.

normal.description: At the end of your turn, get 2 Blood Gems and play 2 more on this.

golden.description: At the end of your turn, get 4 Blood Gems and play 4 more on this.

normal.description: Your Battlecries trigger twice.

golden.description: Your Battlecries trigger three times.

normal.description: While this is in your hand, after you play a Murloc, gain +3/+3.

golden.description: While this is in your hand, after you play a Murloc, gain +6/+6.

normal.description: Avenge (2): Play 2 Blood Gems on all your Quilboar.

golden.description: Avenge (2): Play 4 Blood Gems on all your Quilboar.

normal.description: Whenever this takes damage, get a Blood Gem. (3 times per combat.)

golden.description: Whenever this takes damage, get two Blood Gems. (3 times per combat.)

normal.description: Battlecry: Make a friendly minion Golden.

golden.description: Battlecry: Make a friendly minion Golden.

normal.description: Avenge (3): Your Undead have +1 Attack this game (wherever they are).

golden.description: Avenge (3): Your Undead have +2 Attack this game (wherever they are).

normal.description: At the end of your turn, play a Blood Gem on your other minions.

golden.description: At the end of your turn, play 2 Blood Gems on your other minions.

normal.description: Minions in the Tavern have +10/+10.

golden.description: Minions in the Tavern have +20/+20.

normal.description: Divine Shield. Whenever you cast a Tavern spell, give your minions with Divine Shield +2 Attack.

golden.description: Divine Shield. Whenever you cast a Tavern spell, give your minions with Divine Shield +4 Attack.

normal.description: Start of Combat: Double this minion's stats.

golden.description: Start of Combat: Triple this minion's stats.

normal.description: Whenever this takes damage, deal 5 damage to a random enemy minion.

golden.description: Whenever this takes damage, deal 5 damage to a random enemy minion, twice.

normal.description: Stealth. Deathrattle: Summon your first Demon that died this combat. It keeps enchantments.

golden.description: Stealth. Deathrattle: Summon your first 2 Demons that died this combat. They keep enchantments.

normal.description: Whenever you cast a spell, gain Divine Shield, Windfury, or Venomous until next turn.

golden.description: Whenever you cast a spell, gain Divine Shield, Windfury, or Venomous until next turn.

normal.description: After you summon a minion in combat, give your minions +3 Attack.

golden.description: After you summon a minion in combat, give your minions +6 Attack.

normal.description: Spellcraft: Give a minion +1/+1 until next turn. Improve your future Deep Blues.

golden.description: Spellcraft: Give a minion +2/+2 until next turn. Improve your future Deep Blues.

normal.description: Divine Shield. Whenever you summon a Mech during combat, gain +2 Attack and Divine Shield.

golden.description: Divine Shield. Whenever you summon a Mech during combat, gain +4 Attack and Divine Shield.

normal.description: Start of Combat: Give a minion in your hand +2/+2, then summon it for this combat only.

golden.description: Start of Combat: Give a minion in your hand +4/+4, then summon it for this combat only.

normal.description: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly Undead to get a plain copy of it.

golden.description: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly Undead to get 2 plain copies of it.

normal.description: Spellcraft: Trigger a friendly minion's Battlecry.

golden.description: Spellcraft: Trigger a friendly minion's Battlecry twice.

normal.description: Your end of turn effects trigger twice.

golden.description: Your end of turn effects trigger three times.

normal.description: Battlecry: Give your other Dragons +3/+1.

golden.description: Battlecry: Give your other Dragons +6/+2.

normal.description: Divine Shield. This minion can triple with any Elemental.

golden.description: Divine Shield. This minion can triple with any Elemental.

normal.description: Has +2/+2 for each Tavern spell you've cast this game (wherever this is).

golden.description: Has +4/+4 for each Tavern spell you've cast this game (wherever this is).

normal.description: Reborn. Deathrattle: Summon 1 Eternal Knight.

golden.description: Reborn. Deathrattle: Summon a Golden Eternal Knight.

normal.description: Battlecry: Transform a minion into one from a Tier higher.

golden.description: Battlecry: Transform a minion into one from 2 Tiers higher.

normal.description: At the end of your turn, consume a minion in the Tavern to gain its stats.

golden.description: At the end of your turn, consume a minion in the Tavern to gain double its stats.

normal.description: At the end of your turn, your Demons consume a minion in the Tavern to gain its stats.

golden.description: At the end of your turn, your Demons consume a minion in the Tavern to gain double its stats.

normal.description: After you cast 2 spells, consume a minion in the Tavern to gain its stats. (2 left!)

golden.description: After you cast 2 spells, consume a minion in the Tavern to gain double its stats. (2 left!)

normal.description: Deathrattle: Minions in the Tavern have +2 Attack this game.

golden.description: Deathrattle: Minions in the Tavern have +4 Attack this game.

normal.description: After you spend 9 Gold, get a random Pirate. (9 Gold left!)

golden.description: After you spend 9 Gold, get 2 random Pirates. (9 Gold left!)

normal.description: Whenever your hero takes damage on your turn, gain +2/+2.

golden.description: Whenever your hero takes damage on your turn, gain +4/+4.

normal.description: Has +2/+1 for each Elemental you played this game (wherever this is).

golden.description: Has +4/+2 for each Elemental you played this game (wherever this is).

normal.description: Also damages the minions next to whomever it attacks.

golden.description: Also damages the minions next to whomever it attacks.

normal.description: Battlecry: Play a Blood Gem on all your other minions.

golden.description: Battlecry: Play 2 Blood Gems on all your other minions.

normal.description: Battlecry: Get a 2/1 Smolderwing with 'Battlecry: Give a Dragon +5 Attack.'

golden.description: Battlecry: Get two 2/1 Smolderwings with 'Battlecry: Give a Dragon +5 Attack.'

normal.description: Divine Shield. Whenever a Blood Gem is played on this, play a Blood Gem on a different friendly minion.

golden.description: Divine Shield. Whenever a Blood Gem is played on this, play 2 Blood Gems on a different friendly minion.

normal.description: Deathrattle: Summon 2 random Deathrattle minions.

golden.description: Deathrattle: Summon 4 random Deathrattle minions.

normal.description: Taunt. Spellcraft: Give a minion Divine Shield until next turn.

golden.description: Taunt. Spellcraft: Give a minion Divine Shield until next turn.

normal.description: Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Microbots.

golden.description: Deathrattle: Summon two 2/2 Microbots.

golden.description: Battlecry: Give a friendly Mech +4/+4.

normal.description: Magnetic. At the end of your turn, give another friendly Mech +2 Attack.

golden.description: Magnetic. At the end of your turn, give another friendly Mech +4 Attack.

normal.description: Taunt. After this minion attacks, gain +2/+2.

golden.description: Taunt. After this minion attacks, gain +4/+4.

normal.description: Battlecry: Discover a Murloc.

golden.description: Battlecry: Discover two Murlocs.

normal.description: Battlecry: Give your other Murlocs +3 Attack.

golden.description: Battlecry: Give your other Murlocs +6 Attack.

normal.description: Start of Combat: Gain the stats of all the minions in your hand.

golden.description: Start of Combat: Gain the stats of all the minions in your hand twice.

normal.description: After another friendly Murloc dies, gain +1/+1.

golden.description: After another friendly Murloc dies, gain +2/+2.

normal.description: Deathrattle: Summon the highest Health Murloc from your hand for this combat only.

golden.description: Deathrattle: Summon the 2 highest Health Murlocs from your hand for this combat only.

normal.description: After a friendly Murloc dies, gain +2/+2.

golden.description: After a friendly Murloc dies, gain +4/+4.

normal.description: After you summon a Murloc, gain +2 Attack.

golden.description: After you summon a Murloc, gain +4 Attack.

normal.description: Frenzy: Gain +4/+4.

golden.description: Frenzy: Gain +8/+8.

normal.description: Divine Shield. After another friendly Beast attacks, gain +2/+2.

golden.description: Divine Shield. After another friendly Beast attacks, gain +4/+4.

normal.description: Reborn. After this minion is Reborn, gain +1/+1.

golden.description: Reborn. After this minion is Reborn, gain +2/+2.

normal.description: After you play a Beast, gain +1/+1.

golden.description: After you play a Beast, gain +2/+2.

normal.description: Taunt. After this minion survives damage, gain +2/+2.

golden.description: Taunt. After this minion survives damage, gain +4/+4.

normal.description: After another friendly Beast dies, gain its Deathrattle effects.

golden.description: After another friendly Beast dies, gain its Deathrattle effects twice.

normal.description: Deathrattle: Give all your Beasts +5/+5.

golden.description: Deathrattle: Give all your Beasts +10/+10.

normal.description: Deathrattle: Summon a number of 1/1 Rats equal to this minion's Attack.

golden.description: Deathrattle: Summon a number of 2/2 Rats equal to this minion's Attack.

normal.description: Magnetic. Deathrattle: Summon three 1/1 Microbots.

golden.description: Magnetic. Deathrattle: Summon six 1/1 Microbots.
